data.title: Star Cast Of The Iron Giant
data.meta_description: A Computer Science portal for geeks. It contains well written, well thought and well explained computer science and programming articles, quizzes and practice/competitive programming/company interview Questions.
data.text:
Warner Bros. released the American animated science fiction movie The Iron Giant in 1999. The Iron Giant cast is full of talented actors and actresses who bring the classic movie to life on screen. The most powerful lesson in the film is that you can control your fate. Even if the Iron Giant was made to be destructive, human interaction could cause the creator’s intentions to change. Diesel gives five simple words so much meaning in one of the movie’s most famous lines: “I am not a gun”. In this article, let’s get to know more about the star cast of The Iron Giant movie in detail.

Leading Star Cast Of The Iron Giant:

Eli Marienthal

Jennifer Aniston

Vin Diesel

Christopher McDonald

Harry Connick Jr.

Harry Shearer

Details of Star Cast of The Iron Giant:

1. Eli Marienthal

Eli Marienthal gave voice to Hogarth William Hughes, an active 9yr old boy who enjoys life. He’s the son of Annie Hughes. His father died in a military war. The Iron Giant acts as his mentor while legal authorities surround him. Eli Marienthal is an award-winning actor. He’s also known for his voice work in Pixar films, including Monsters, Inc., Finding Nemo, and WALL-E. He has voiced 150 characters in more than 50 films and television shows.

2. Jennifer Aniston

Jennifer Aniston has given her voice to Annie Hughes in the movie. She was the wife of a military officer who died years ago. She had a son, Hogarth Hughes. The American actress, film director, and producer Jennifer Aniston has worked in many industries and was part of The Iron Giant star cast. She became famous during her run as Rachel Green on Friends (1994–2004), one of the longest-running sitcoms.

3. Vin Diesel

The lead character, Iron Giant, is voiced by Vin Diesel. He is a 50ft, sturdy metal-eating robot. The metallic robot is attracted to weapons and reacts vigorously to them. Diesel had a profound and expressive voice compared to the Iron Giant character. So, he was the first choice for the character by the makers.

4. Christopher McDonald

Christopher McDonald voiced Kent Mansley in the movie. He is a secretive government agent to track and keep an eye on The Iron Giant. He was investigating the sightings of the Iron Giant. His official car had the logo of the “Bureau of Unexplained Phenomena”. Christopher McDonald (born August 29, 1955) is an actor from the United States. He is perhaps best known for his role as Shooter McGavin in Happy Gilmore. McDonald has starred in numerous successful films, including Near Dark, Flashback, Boogie Nights, Thelma & Louise, Hamburger Hill, Eat Pray Love, and Wanderlust sequel.

5. Harry Connick Jr.

Dean McCoppin is an interesting character whose voice was given by Harry Connick Jr. Dean McCoppin recognized Iron Giant as no harm to any living being. He is the owner of Junkyard. Harry Connick Jr. won a Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance for his song It Had To Be You in 1994. He has been nominated for two Emmy Awards, four Golden Globe Awards, and seven Screen Actors Guild Awards.

6. Harry Shearer

Shearer is best known for his voice given to the Simpsons’ Mr. Burns, Ned Flanders, and Principal Skinner, among his many roles. He also voiced Principal Hager from The Cleveland Show and appeared on Kenan & Kel.

Some Interesting Facts Related to the Iron Giant Movie:

A Ted Hughes novel inspired the movie The Iron Giant.

Originally, Pete Townshend intended The Iron Giant to be a musical.

Brad Bird made his feature film directorial debut with The Iron Giant.

The title character of The Iron Giant was computer generated.

Cast Trivia & Behind-the-Scenes Insights: The Iron Giant

Director Brad Bird and actors Jennifer Aniston, Vin Diesel, John Mahoney, Christopher McDonald, and Harry Connick Jr. tell us what was involved in bringing The Iron Giant (1999) to life and working together with other cast members in a featurette included on The Iron Giant Ultimate Collector’s Edition Blu-ray. The Iron Giant box office collection is estimated to be $31.3 million worldwide. There is also an audio commentary with Bird (if you can find it), but that is for die-hard fans only as it is a bit dry/boring.

Conclusion

The Iron Giant is an action movie, and you can find many popular characters in the main cast. This article has covered all the important information related to The Iron Giant Full Cast, amazing facts related to Iron Giant, the main characters, and more.
